title: Online Collaborative Learning to Strengthen Analytical Competencies of Agricultural Practitioners

context.additional_context: Practicing professionals primarily use smartphones, learning management skills and social practice changes through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Participants can design practical improvement plans by applying agricultural management techniques (e.g., resource allocation, productivity analysis)
Participants can develop communication strategies to effectively convey learned skills to non-participants (peers)
Participants can establish decision-making criteria by comparing the advantages and disadvantages of traditional practices and new management methods

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
